text: Zhu Rongji (; born 1 October 1928) is a Chinese politician. He served as Mayor and Party chief in Shanghai between 1987 and 1991. He then served as Vice Premier and then fifth Premier of the People's Republic of China from March 1998 to March 2003.Yu, Jess Macy. "Former Chinese Premier Draws Praise for His Philanthropy". The New York Times. February 23, 2013. Retrieved July 14, 2015. ==References== ==Other websites== *Profile at China Vitae Category:1928 births Category:Living people Category:Premiers of the People's Republic of China Category:Vice Premiers of the People's Republic of China
title: Zhu Rongji
